alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 2:43PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma County. In Kansas, Decatur, Norton and Graham Counties. In Nebraska, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and perhaps a wall of dust is expected reducing visibilities and making travel hazardous if not dangerous at times.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
